publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3694 Patrick Harvie: Offences (Aggravation by Prejudice) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Offences (Aggravation by Prejudice) (Scotland) Bill.
S3M-3694 Patrick Harvie: Offences (Aggravation by Prejudice) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Offences (Aggravation by Prejudice) (Scotland) Bill.
